text: Cristhian Alexis Árabe Pedraza (born 25 December 1991) is a Bolivian footballer who plays for Club Always Ready in the Bolivian Primera División. https://uk.soccerway.com/players/christhian-arabe/121988/ On 3 March 2019 Arabe made his debut for the Bolivia national football team against Nicaragua.https://int.soccerway.com/matches/2019/03/03/world/friendlies/bolivia/nicaragua/2992140/ ==References== ==External links== * * Cristhian Árabe at footballdatabase.eu Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Bolivia international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Club Always Ready players Category:Bolivian Primera División players
title: Cristhian Árabe
